87147.en:
<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I would like you to fetch me Peace Incense,
it's said to be dropped by <%sEV_QUE_NAME0>s
in the Lyana Desolate Area.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87147.ja:
<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「あなたに　取ってきていただきたい
　安らぎの香は　リャナ荒涼地帯にいる
　<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>が　落とすそうなのです。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87147.ko:
<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 이번에 부탁드리는
　평안의 향은 랴나 황량 지대에 있는
　{%sEV_QUE_NAME0}|hpp(이,가) 떨어뜨린다고 합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87147.zh-Hans:
<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>寥那荒凉地带的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
会掉落安宁香料，
拜托你去弄来一些吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87147.zh-Hant:
<voice 00035_00087147><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>我想請你帶回的安寧之香，
據說冽那荒涼地帶的<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>
似乎會掉落。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57479.en:
<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Lucolia, I'm with a visitor now. Can you not
even properly knock?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57479.ja:
<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「ルコリア。今は　来客中だ。
　お前は　ノックも　まともにできないのか？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57479.ko:
<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 루코리아. 지금 손님이 계시지 않느냐?
　노크 하나도 제대로 못 하는 거냐?<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57479.zh-Hans:
<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>露珂莉娅。现在家里有客人。
你连敲门都不会吗？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57479.zh-Hant:
<voice 00405_00057479><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>露可莉亞，我現在有客人，
妳連敲門都不會嗎？<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57480.en:
<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I heard from Mama... You're holding a
meeting for everyone in town, aren't you?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57480.ja:
<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……ママから　話を聞いたの。
　町の人のために　集会を開くんですってね。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57480.ko:
<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……엄마한테 들었어요.
　마을 사람들을 위해 집회를 연다면서요.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57480.zh-Hans:
<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……我听妈妈说了，
你要为了镇上的人召开集会。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57480.zh-Hant:
<voice 00475_00057480><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……媽媽跟我說了。
你要為了鎮上的居民召開集會。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

87175.en:
<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I-instead of that, how about you go to my
sister's grave... And offer even a single
flower?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87175.ja:
<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「そ　そんなことより　姉さんのお墓に……
　お花のひとつでも　供えてきたらどうなの？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87175.ko:
<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 그, 그럴 시간에 언니의 무덤에……
　꽃 한 송이라도 올리는 게 어때요?<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87175.zh-Hans:
<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>你、你有时间做这种事……
还不如去给姐姐墓前献一支花！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
87175.zh-Hant:
<voice 00505_00087175><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>有時間做這種事……
還不如去給姊姊墓前獻上一朵花？<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57481.en:
<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>You... You always make excuses that you're
too busy to... You never once visited her
grave, have you.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57481.ja:
<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「い　忙しいとか　言い訳して　まだ一度も
　姉さんのお墓参り……行ってないじゃない。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57481.ko:
<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 바, 바쁘다는 핑계로 아직까지 한 번도
　언니의 무덤을…… 찾아간 적도 없잖아요.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57481.zh-Hans:
<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>你、你总是用自己很忙当借口，
连一次都没有……去祭拜过姐姐。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57481.zh-Hant:
<voice 00545_00057481><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>你總是把工作當成藉口，
一次都沒去掃過姊姊的墓。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57482.en:
<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I, as mayor, have things I must do.
A child should never interrupt every
single one of an adult's actions.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57482.ja:
<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「私には　町長として　なすべきことがある。
　子供が　大人のやることに
　いちいち　クチをはさむんじゃない。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57482.ko:
<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 나는 촌장으로서 해야 할 일이 있다.
　어린애가 어른들이 하는 일에
　일일이 참견하면 못써.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57482.zh-Hans:
<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>我作为镇长，有自己应尽的责任。
小孩子不要
总是插嘴大人的事。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57482.zh-Hant:
<voice 00585_00057482><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>我身為鎮長有很多事要做。
小孩子少多嘴
管大人的事。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57484.en:
<voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>You are interrupting our conversation.
Now, leave.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57484.ja: <voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「話のジャマだ。さあ　出ていけ。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57484.ko: <voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 손님과 얘기 중이다. 어서 나가거라.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57484.zh-Hans: <voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>你妨碍我们谈话了，快出去。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57484.zh-Hant: <voice 00715_00057484><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>妳打擾到我們說話了，快出去吧。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57485.en:
<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Really, although it's unbecoming, I have
to put my foot down. Recently, she has
become quite brazen...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57485.ja:
<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「まったく　見苦しいところを
　お見せしましたな。
　近頃　すっかり　生意気になりまして……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57485.ko:
<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 이것 참 창피한 꼴을
　보이고 말았군요.
　요즘 들어 부쩍 대들기 시작해서…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57485.zh-Hans:
<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>真是的，让你见笑了。
这孩子最近特别任性妄为……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57485.zh-Hant:
<voice 01020_00057485><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>不好意思，讓你見笑了。
她最近越來越叛逆了……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57486.en:
<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Now then, there isn't much time before the
meeting. Please get the Peace Incense I
requested.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57486.ja:
<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「さあ　集会まで　あまり時間がありません。
　安らぎの香の調達を　頼みましたぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57486.ko:
<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 자, 집회까지 시간이 얼마 없습니다.
　평안의 향을 조달해 주시기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57486.zh-Hans:
<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>离集会开始已经没有多少时间了。
找安宁香料这事就拜托你了。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57486.zh-Hant:
<voice 01060_00057486><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>距離集會開始沒多少時間了。
就拜託你準備安寧之香囉。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57487.en:
<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>The town's adults are scared stupid because
they think the dead children despise them...
Here, have a look at my sister's diary.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57487.ja:
<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「町の大人たちったら　子供たちの幽霊に
　恨まれてるとか　おびえちゃって　バカみたい。
　……ほら　姉さんの日記　読んでみてよ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57487.ko:
<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 마을 어른들은 아이들의 유령이
　원한을 품었다며 겁이나 먹고 한심해.
　……자, 언니의 일기 좀 읽어 봐.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57487.zh-Hans:
<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>镇上的大人们真是的，说什么被孩子们的幽灵
怨恨了，一个个都害怕得不得了，像傻子似的。
……来，你来看看姐姐的日记。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57487.zh-Hant:
<voice 00250_00057487><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>鎮上的大人們都說是被孩子們的幽靈怨恨，
個個都害怕得瑟瑟發抖，有夠蠢的。
……你看，姊姊的日記裡都寫了。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57488.ja: <pc>は　リゼロッタの日記帳を読んだ。

57489.en:
..."Up until now, we've always rebelled against the
adults, however, now that we're living on our own,
we've come to understand the adults' merits."
57489.ja:
……今まで　大人に反抗してきた　私たちだけど
自力で　生活するようになってから
大人のありがたみが　わかるようになったわ。
57489.ko:
……그동안 우린 어른에게 반항해 왔지만
스스로의 힘으로 생활하기 시작하면서
어른들에게 고마운 마음을 갖게 되었다.
57489.zh-Hans:
……我们至今为止一直在反抗大人，
但开始独立生活之后，我们才明白
大人有多么重要，我们应该感谢大人。
57489.zh-Hant:
……總是反抗大人的我們，
直到需要靠自己維生以後，
才終於懂得要感恩大人們。

57490.en:
"Now everyone, everyday, goes to Alltrades Abbey and
we see to it that we don't miss a prayer, in order
for the adults to soon return."
57490.ja:
今は　みんなで　毎日　ダーマ神殿に行って
大人たちが　早く帰ってくるように
お祈りを欠かさないようにしているの。
57490.ko:
지금은 다 같이 날마다 다마 신전에 가서
어른들이 빨리 돌아오기를
하루도 빠짐없이 기도드리고 있다.
57490.zh-Hans:
现在我们每天都去达玛神殿，
不断祈祷大人们能早点回来。
57490.zh-Hant:
現在大家每天都會去達瑪神殿，
祈禱大人們
可以早日回歸。

57491.en:
"There's a chance we might never see the adults ever
again, but if we keep praying, then someday..."
57491.ja:
もしかしたら　大人たちとは
もう　二度と会えないのかもしれないけど
祈りつづけていれば　いつか……。
57491.ko:
어쩌면 어른들을 두 번 다시
못 만날지도 모르지만
계속 기도드리다 보면 언젠가…….
57491.zh-Hans:
也许我们再也不能
见到大人们了，
但是只要我们一直祈祷，总有一天……
57491.zh-Hant:
也許我們再也無法
見到大人們了，
但只要每日誠心祈禱，也許有一天……

57492.en:
<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...My older sister and the others don't hate them. Every
day, at Alltrades Abbey they quietly pray, and await
the adults' return.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57492.ja:
<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……姉さんたちは　誰も　恨んでない。
　毎日　ダーマ神殿で　静かにお祈りして
　大人たちの帰りを　待ってるのよ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57492.ko:
<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……언니와 아이들은 아무도 원망하지 않아.
　매일 다마 신전에서 조용히 기도를 드리며
　어른들이 돌아오기를 기다리고 있어.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57492.zh-Hans:
<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……姐姐她们谁也没有怨恨。
每天都在达玛神殿静静地祈祷，
等着大人们回来。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57492.zh-Hant:
<voice 00510_00057492><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……姊姊和大家並不怨恨任何人。
她們每天都在達瑪神殿靜心祈禱，
等待大人們的歸來。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57493.en:
<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Whereas the adults all have stopped going to pray...
It's completely backwards.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57493.ja:
<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「町の大人たちは　すっかり
　お祈りに行かなくなったのに……
　これじゃ　まるで　あべこべだわ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57493.ko:
<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 마을 어른들은 이미
　아무도 기도하러 가지 않는데……
　이건 상황이 완전히 반대잖아.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57493.zh-Hans:
<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>而镇上的大人们
已经完全不去祈祷了……
这和以前完全相反啊。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57493.zh-Hant:
<voice 00540_00057493><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>鎮上的大人們
早就不去祈禱了……
簡直是反過來了。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57494.en:
<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Ooh, you have brought the Peace Incense, have you.
Just in time for the meeting, excellent. Can you
please give it to me at once?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57494.ja:
<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「おお　安らぎの香を　持ってきてくれましたか。
　集会に間に合ったようで　何よりです。
　さっそく　渡していただけますかな？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57494.ko:
<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 오오, 평안의 향을 가져오셨군요.
　집회 시간에 늦지 않아서 다행입니다.
　지금 바로 주시겠습니까?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57494.zh-Hans:
<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>哦，你把安宁香料带来了啊。
能赶上集会的时间真是太好了。
可以快点交给我吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57494.zh-Hant:
<voice 00401_00057494><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>喔喔，你帶來安寧之香了嗎？
趕上集會真是太好了。
那麼快來交給我吧？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57495.en:
<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Oh yeah, why is that. Without the Peace Incense, the
meeting cannot start. Come now, may you give it to me?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57495.ja:
<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「……おや　どうしました。
　安らぎの香がないと　集会が始められません。
　さあ　渡していただけますかな？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57495.ko:
<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: ……응? 왜 그러시죠?
　평안의 향이 있어야 집회를 열 수 있습니다.
　자, 어서 주시겠습니까?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57495.zh-Hans:
<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……怎么了？
你不把安宁香料给我，集会就无法开始。
可以交给我吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57495.zh-Hant:
<voice 00541_00057495><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……怎麼了？
沒有安寧之香集會就無法開始。
可以交給我嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57496.en: <pc> gave Mayor Burat the Peace Incense.
57496.ja:
<pc>は　ブラト町長に
安らぎの香を　渡した。
57496.zh-Hans:
<pc>把安宁香料
交给了布莱特镇长。
57496.zh-Hant:
<pc>把安寧之香
交給了布萊特鎮長！

57497.en:
<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Yeah, we are saved. This time, a special guest is here
as well, so the meeting will surely go about smoothly.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57497.ja:
<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「いや　助かりました。
　今回は　特別ゲストも　お招きしていますし
　この集会は　きっと　うまくいくことでしょう。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57497.ko:
<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 이거 정말 감사합니다.
　특별 게스트도 모셨으니
　이번 집회는 틀림없이 잘될 겁니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57497.zh-Hans:
<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>哎呀，这可真是帮了大忙。
这次我们还请来了一位特别来宾。
这次的集会一定会顺利进行的。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57497.zh-Hant:
<voice 00611_00057497><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>幫大忙了。
這次我們還找來特別來賓，
這次集會一定會很成功的。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57498.en:
<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Since I am told the discussion will certainly be
beneficial, you, too, are welcome to join us.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57498.ja:
<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「ためになるお話が　聞けますし
　ぜひ　あなたも参加していってください。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57498.ko:
<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 유익한 이야기를 들으실 수 있을 테니
　당신도 꼭 참석하고 가시기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57498.zh-Hans:
<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>集会上能听到很多有益处的话，
请你也一定要参加。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57498.zh-Hant:
<voice 00641_00057498><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>能聽到一些有用的資訊，
希望你也能參加。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57499.en:
From all over town, adults came to gather at the
Assembly Hall.
57499.ja:
町中の　大人たちが
集会所に　集まってきた。
57499.zh-Hans:
整个镇子的大人们都
集中到了集会所。
57499.zh-Hant:
鎮上的大人們
都聚集到集會所了。

57500.en:
<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Everyone, for having gathered for such a sudden
meeting today, truly, I thank you very much.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57500.ja:
<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「皆さん　本日は
　突然の集会に　お集まりいただき
　まことに　ありがとうございます。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57500.ko:
<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 여러분, 오늘은
　갑작스러운 집회임에도 모여 주셔서
　진심으로 감사합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57500.zh-Hans:
<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>今天非常感谢各位
能够前来参加
这场突然召开的集会。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57500.zh-Hant:
<voice 00941_00057500><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>今天非常感謝各位
前來參加
這場突然的集會。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57501.en:
<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Since the old church's accident, the town has been in
profound grief. And beginning to fear the ghostly
figures. Therefore...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57501.ja:
<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「あの　古い教会の事故が起きてから
　この町は　深い悲しみに包まれ　幽霊の姿に
　おびえるようになりました。そこで……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57501.ko:
<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 낡은 교회의 그 사고 이후로
　우리 마을은 깊은 슬픔에 잠겼고 유령의 모습에
　벌벌 떠는 지경에 이르렀습니다. 그래서……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57501.zh-Hans:
<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>自从那个古老的教会发生了那样的事故之后，
整个镇子都沉浸在悲伤中，
而且终日因幽灵而惶惶不安，所以……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57501.zh-Hant:
<voice 00991_00057501><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>自從那個古老的教會發生了那樣的事故，
這座市鎮便一直籠罩在巨大的悲傷中，
開始畏懼著幽靈的身影。於是……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57502.en:
<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Today, I will free you from your grief and worries;
that is why I have come.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57502.ja:
<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「……本日は　そんな　皆さんを
　悩みや　苦しみから解き放つため
　このぼくが　やってきました。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57502.ko:
<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: ……오늘은 그런 여러분을
　고민과 고통에서 해방시켜 드리고자
　제가 왔습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57502.zh-Hans:
<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……今天为了将大家从
烦恼和痛苦中解放出来，
我来到了这里。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57502.zh-Hant:
<voice 01076_00057502><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>今天正是我
要將各位從煩惱和痛苦中
解放出來。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57503.en:
<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>I am Sadak. Rescuing this town from evil spirits
threatening it is what I do as a traveling medium.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57503.ja:
<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「ぼくは　サダク。
　悪霊におびやかされている　この町を
　救うためにやってきた　旅の霊媒師です。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57503.ko:
<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 제 이름은 사다크.
　악령에 떨고 있는 이 마을을
　구하러 온 유랑 영매사입니다.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57503.zh-Hans:
<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>我叫萨达克。是旅行中的通灵师。
是为了拯救这个
被恶灵威胁的小镇而来的。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57503.zh-Hant:
<voice 01376_00057503><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>我叫薩達克，
是個旅行中的靈媒，為了拯救這個
被惡靈叨擾的市鎮而前來此地。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57504.en: <voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>Ou-our children are... Evil spirits, you say!?<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57504.ja: <voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>「ウ　ウチの子を……悪霊ですって！？<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57504.ko: <voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>: 우, 우리 애가…… 악령이라고요!?<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57504.zh-Hans: <voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>你、你说我家孩子……是恶灵！<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57504.zh-Hant: <voice 01426_00057504><start_lip_sync n02177 _normal m00001>你、你說我們家的孩子變成了惡靈！？<stop_lip_animation n02177 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57505.en:
<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Correct, they are assuredly evil spirits. When one dies
bearing a grudge, their soul becomes an evil spirit
who curse the living!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57505.ja:
<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「……そう　悪霊なのです。
　恨みを抱いたまま　死んでしまった者の魂は
　悪霊となって　生者を呪うのですよ。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57505.ko:
<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: ……네, 악령이죠.
　원한을 품은 채 죽은 자의 혼은
　악령이 되어 산 자를 저주하거든요.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57505.zh-Hans:
<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……对，就是恶灵！
心怀怨恨的人死去之后，
灵魂就会变成恶灵，诅咒生者。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57505.zh-Hant:
<voice 01486_00057505><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……沒錯，他變成了惡靈。
含恨而死的人的靈魂，
會變成惡靈並詛咒生者。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57506.en:
<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>First, to prevent evil spirits from entering, I have
prepared Peace Incense mixed with Saint's Ashes; let's
burn it to purify the Assembly Hall.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57506.ja:
<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「まずは　悪霊が入ってこないように
　安らぎの香に　ぼくが用意した聖灰を混ぜて
　たくことで　この集会所を清めましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57506.ko:
<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 우선 악령이 들어오지 못하도록
　평안의 향을 제가 준비한 신성한 재와 함께
　태우며 이 집회소를 정화하겠습니다.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57506.zh-Hans:
<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>首先，为了不让恶灵进来，
我会先把安宁香料和我准备好的圣灰混合，
然后焚香净化这个集会所。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57506.zh-Hant:
<voice 01596_00057506><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>首先，為了不讓惡靈靠近，
我將安寧之香與我準備好的聖灰調合在一起，
淨化了這個集會所。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57507.en: <voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>Ah? Smells nice...<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57507.ja: <voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>「あら？　いい香り……。<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57507.ko: <voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>: 어머? 향기가 참 좋네…….<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57507.zh-Hans: <voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>哎呀？这个香味真好闻……<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57507.zh-Hant: <voice 01986_00057507><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>咦？好香的味道……<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57508.en: <voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>Yeah... It's a bit comforting...<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57508.ja: <voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>「ああ……なんだか　安らぐよ……。<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57508.ko: <voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>: 그래…… 왠지 편안해져…….<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57508.zh-Hans: <voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>啊……感觉心里平静多了……<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57508.zh-Hant: <voice 02076_00057508><start_lip_sync n02178 _normal m00001>真的耶……好像有一種放鬆的感覺……<stop_lip_animation n02178 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57509.en:
<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>...Now, please think back to a time like when your
children were alive.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57509.ja:
<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「……さあ　お子さんが　生きていた時のことを
　ようく　思いだしてみてください。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57509.ko:
<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: ……자, 아이들이 살아 있던 시절을
　자~알 떠올려 보세요.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57509.zh-Hans:
<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……来，好好回想一下孩子们
活着的时候的事。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57509.zh-Hant:
<voice 02136_00057509><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>……來吧，請大家仔細回想
孩子們生前的模樣。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57510.en: <voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Do you feel there is a reason for the children to hold a grudge? You remember mistreating the children, do you not?<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57510.ja:
<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「彼らが　何か恨みを抱くような
　きっかけは　ありませんでしたか？
　子供に　つらく当たった覚えは　ありませんか？<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57510.ko:
<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 아이들이 어떤 원한을 품을 만한
　계기는 없었나요?
　아이들에게 화풀이를 한 기억은 없습니까?<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57510.zh-Hans:
<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>想一想他们是因为什么
才开始心怀怨恨的？
你们曾经很严厉地对待他们吗？<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57510.zh-Hant:
<voice 02166_00057510><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>他們是否因為某種原因
而懷抱怨恨呢？
你們是否打罵過孩子們呢？<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57511.en:
<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>I-I... Always had a strict curfew and didn't let them
play much...<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57511.ja:
<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>「わ　私……いつも　門限を厳しくして
　あまり　遊ばせてあげなかったわ……。<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57511.ko:
<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>: 나, 나는…… 늘 통금 시간을 강요하고
　밖에서 많이 놀게 해 주지 않았는데…….<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57511.zh-Hans:
<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>我、我……严格地规定了回家的时间，
都不太让孩子玩……<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57511.zh-Hant:
<voice 02206_00057511><start_lip_sync n02179 _normal m00001>我、我嚴格規定了門禁時間，
沒讓他玩到什麼……<stop_lip_animation n02179 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57512.en:
<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n02176 _normal m00001>I-I... Always lectured them about studying and that
pushed them over the edge...<stop_lip_animation n02176 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57512.ja:
<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n02176 _normal m00001>「オ　オレ……しょっちゅう
　勉強しろって　お説教してたから
　それが　子供を追い詰めたのかも……。<stop_lip_animation n02176 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57512.ko:
<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n02176 _normal m00001>: 내, 내가…… 하도
　공부하라고 잔소리를 해서
　우리 아이가 힘들어했던 것 같은…….<stop_lip_animation n02176 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57512.zh-Hans:
<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n02176 _normal m00001>我、我……经常教训他
要好好学习，
一直逼着孩子……<stop_lip_animation n02176 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57512.zh-Hant:
<voice 02246_00057512><start_lip_sync n02176 _normal m00001>我、也是……
老是叫他要好好讀書，
可能把孩子逼得太緊了……<stop_lip_animation n02176 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57513.en:
<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>I see... Strict discipline pushed the town's children to
hate the adults and begin to seclude themselves in the
old church to play.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57513.ja:
<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「なるほど……。厳しい　しつけに追い詰められ
　町の子供たちは　大人を嫌い
　古い教会に閉じこもって　遊ぶようになった。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57513.ko:
<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 이제 알겠네요……. 엄격하게 몰아세운 탓에
　마을의 아이들은 어른들을 원망하며
　낡은 교회에 숨어서 놀게 되었죠.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57513.zh-Hans:
<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>原来如此……因为一直被严格地管教，
孩子们才会开始讨厌大人，
躲在古老的教会里自己玩。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57513.zh-Hant:
<voice 02286_00057513><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>原來如此……厭煩了囉唆又嚴厲的大人們，
鎮上的孩子們便自己在古老的教會裡
開始玩了起來。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57514.en:
<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Thus, due to the landslide, they lost their lives, and
wander this world as grudge-bearing evil spirits...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57514.ja:
<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「そして　ガケ崩れにより　命を落とし
　この世に　恨みを抱いたまま　悪霊として
　さまよっているのですね……。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57514.ko:
<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 그러다 암반 붕괴에 목숨을 잃고
　원한을 품은 채 악령으로서 이 세상을
　떠돌고 있는 겁니다…….<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57514.zh-Hans:
<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>然后发生了那场山体滑坡，
失去生命的孩子们心怀怨恨，
变成恶灵徘徊在世上……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57514.zh-Hant:
<voice 02316_00057514><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>然後發生了山崩，
失去生命的孩子們便滿懷怨恨，
成了怨靈徘徊在這世上……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57515.en:
<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>As it is, the evil spirits will continue to curse everyone,
until you have joined them...<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57515.ja:
<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「このままだと　皆さんは　悪霊に呪われ続け
　いずれは　道連れに……。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57515.ko:
<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 이대로 있다가는 여러분 모두
　악령의 저주를 받다가 결국 저승길 동무로…….<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57515.zh-Hans:
<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>这样下去的话，
持续被恶灵诅咒的各位，
早晚有一天会被他们带去那个世界……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57515.zh-Hant:
<voice 02346_00057515><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>要是這樣下去，各位繼續受到惡靈詛咒，
總有一天會被他們帶去陪葬……<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57516.en:
<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>However, please do not worry. Everyone shall have no
reason to be afraid of the evil spirits from here on, as I
shall protect you!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57516.ja:
<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「ですが　ご安心ください。
　皆さんが　悪霊におびやかされぬよう
　これからは　ぼくが　お守りいたします！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57516.ko:
<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 하지만 안심하세요.
　여러분이 악령을 두려워할 필요가 없도록
　앞으로는 제가 지켜 드리겠습니다!<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57516.zh-Hans:
<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>不过请放心。
今后我会保护大家，
不受恶灵的威胁。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57516.zh-Hant:
<voice 02446_00057516><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>不過，請放心。
為了讓大家不再害怕惡靈，
今後就由我來守護大家！<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57517.en: <voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...You're a liar, aren't you.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57517.ja: <voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……あなた　ウソつきね。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57517.zh-Hans: <voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……你是个骗子。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57517.zh-Hant: <voice 03001_00057517><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……你這個騙子。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57518.en:
<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>My sister and the others don't have some stupid grudge
against the adults. If you examine this diary, you
should understand...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57518.ja:
<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「姉さんたちは　大人を　恨んでなんかいない。
　この日記帳を見れば　わかるはず……。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57518.ko:
<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 언니와 아이들은 어른들을 원망하지 않아.
　이 일기장을 보면 알 수 있어…….<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57518.zh-Hans:
<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>姐姐她们没有怨恨大人。
你们看了这本日记就明白了……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57518.zh-Hant:
<voice 03031_00057518><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……姊姊和大家並不恨大人們。
只要看了這本日記，你們就會知道……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57519.en:
<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...This is my sister's diary. It's a special diary connecting
this world with the other world.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57519.ja:
<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……これは　姉さんの遺品。
　この世と　あの世をつなぐ　特別な日記帳よ。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57519.ko:
<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……이건 언니의 유품이야.
　이 세계와 저 세계를 잇는 특별한 일기장.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57519.zh-Hans:
<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……这是姐姐的遗物。
是连接了这个世界和那个世界的特殊日记本。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57519.zh-Hant:
<voice 03161_00057519><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……這是姊姊的遺物。
是本很特別的日記，可以連接這個世界和那個世界。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57520.en:
<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>...If you read inside, you'll understand about that
world. The children who died in the church accident
don't even realize that they are dead.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57520.ja:
<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「……中を読めば　あの世のことが　わかるわ。
　教会の事故で　死んだ子供たちは
　自分が死んだってことに　気づいてないの。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57520.ko:
<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: ……이걸 읽으면 저쪽 세계에 대해 알 수 있어.
　교회 사고로 죽은 아이들은
　자신이 죽었다는 걸 몰라.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57520.zh-Hans:
<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……看了里面的内容，就能知道那边的世界
发生了什么。在教会的事故中死去的孩子们，
并没有意识到自己死了。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57520.zh-Hant:
<voice 03256_00057520><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>……讀了日記的內容，就能知道那個世界發生的事。
在教會的事故中死去的孩子們，
沒發現自己已經死了。<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57521.en:
<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>In the world of the dead where there are only children,
they keep waiting for the adults whom somehow
vanished to return!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57521.ja:
<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「子供しかいない　死の世界で
　どこかに消えてしまった　大人たちが
　帰ってきてくれるのを　待ち続けているのよ！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57521.ko:
<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 아이들뿐인 죽음의 세계에서
　어디론가 사라진 어른들이
　돌아와 주기를 기다리고 있다고!<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57521.zh-Hans:
<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>在那个只有小孩子的死后的世界，
大人们不知道消失到哪里去了，
但孩子们一直在等着他们回来！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57521.zh-Hant:
<voice 03286_00057521><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>在只有孩子們的死後世界裡，
一直等待著
不知道去了哪裡的大人們回來！<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57522.en: <voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Lucolia! Again, you dare to defy me!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57522.ja: <voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「ルコリア！　また　私に逆らおうというのか！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57522.ko: <voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 루코리아! 또 아비의 말을 거스르는 거냐!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57522.zh-Hans: <voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>露珂莉娅！你又要和我对着干吗！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57522.zh-Hant: <voice 03481_00057522><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>露可莉亞！妳又要反抗我嗎！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57523.en:
<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Even so far as to imitate Liselotte's handwriting for
this horrid, elaborate hoax. With this child's daydream,
you are manipulating the adults, aren't you!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57523.ja:
<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「……わざわざ　リゼロッタの字まで　マネして
　ずいぶん　手の込んだ話を作ったものだ。
　子供の空想で　大人を振り回すんじゃない。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57523.ko:
<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: ……리제롯타의 필체까지 흉내 내다니
　아주 정성껏 꾸며 낸 이야기구나. 네 상상으로
　어른들을 쥐락펴락할 생각은 말거라.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57523.zh-Hans:
<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……还特意模仿丽泽萝妲的字迹，
你编这个故事还真没少下功夫啊。
不要用你的幻想来愚弄大人。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57523.zh-Hant:
<voice 03556_00057523><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……妳竟然不惜模仿莉賽蘿塔的字，
還真是演了一齣好戲。
少用小孩子的幻想來耍大人了。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57524.en: <voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>It... It's not some daydream...<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57524.ja: <voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>「く……空想なんかじゃ……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57524.ko: <voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>: 이…… 이건 상상이 아니라……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57524.zh-Hans: <voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>不……不是幻想……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57524.zh-Hant: <voice 03606_00057524><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>我、我才不是在幻想……<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57525.en:
<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>RIGHT NOW, LEAVE! Never again get
in my way!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57525.ja:
<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「さっさと　出ていけ！
　もう　二度と　私のジャマをするな！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57525.ko:
<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 썩 나가지 못하겠느냐!
　다시는 나를 방해하지 말거라!<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57525.zh-Hans:
<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>快给我出去！
不许你再来给我捣乱！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57525.zh-Hant:
<voice 03646_00057525><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>快滾出去！
別再來妨礙我了！<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57526.en:
<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Honestly, I apologize for my daughter's unbelievable
rudeness... She completely rained on this important
meeting.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57526.ja:
<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「まったく　ウチの娘が　とんだ失礼を……。
　大切な集会に　水を差してしまいましたな。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57526.ko:
<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 이것 참, 제 딸아이가 터무니없는 실례를…….
　중요한 집회에 찬물을 끼얹고 말았군요.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57526.zh-Hans:
<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>真是的，我女儿太没礼貌了……
居然跑来妨碍这么重要的集会。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57526.zh-Hant:
<voice 03916_00057526><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>我女兒給大家見笑了……
打擾了重要的集會，真是抱歉。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57527.en:
<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>No, no, don't worry about it. For today, let's adjourn
and we'll continue this meeting again another day.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57527.ja:
<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「いえいえ　お気になさらず。
　今日のところは　ひとまず　お開きにして
　集会の続きは　また後日おこないましょう。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57527.ko:
<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 아닙니다. 괜찮습니다.
　오늘 집회는 여기서 정리하고
　나중에 이어서 진행하도록 하시죠.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57527.zh-Hans:
<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>不用在意。
那今天就先到此为止，
集会的后续另选一天再进行。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57527.zh-Hant:
<voice 03956_00057527><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>不會，您別在意。
今天就先這樣吧，
改日再繼續討論集會的內容吧。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57528.en:
<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>Having achieved our goal for today, we can be excused.
As for the evil spirits, please leave them to me.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57528.ja:
<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>「目的は　果たせましたし
　今日のところは　これで失礼いたします。
　悪霊のことは　ぼくに　おまかせください。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57528.ko:
<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>: 목적은 충분히 이뤘으니
　오늘은 이만 실례하겠습니다.
　악령에 대해서는 제게 맡기세요.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57528.zh-Hans:
<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>要做的事也已经完成了。
今天我就先告辞了。
恶灵的事就交给我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57528.zh-Hant:
<voice 03996_00057528><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>我的目的也已經達成，
今天先失陪了。
惡靈的事就交給我吧。<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57529.en: The adults followed Sadak and left...
57529.ja:
大人たちは　サダクの後に
したがうように　出ていった……。
57529.ko:
어른들은 사다크의 뒤를 따르듯이
집회소를 나섰다…….
57529.zh-Hans: 大人们跟在萨达克后面出去了……
57529.zh-Hant:
大人們像是跟著薩達克一般，
魚貫走出集會所……

57530.en:
<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>Truly, thank you for your help in preparation for the
meeting, despite how it ended.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57530.ja:
<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「せっかく　準備を手伝っていただいたのに
　こんなカタチで　終わってしまい
　申し訳ありませんでしたな。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57530.ko:
<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 기껏 준비를 도와주셨는데
　이런 식으로 끝나 버려서
　죄송합니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57530.zh-Hans:
<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>难得你特意帮我做了准备，
可集会居然以这种形式结束了，
真是非常抱歉。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57530.zh-Hant:
<voice 04191_00057530><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>難得您幫忙準備，
沒想到這樣草草收場，
真是非常抱歉。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57531.en:
<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>As Sadak said, thanks to the Peace Incense, until about
halfway through, everyone was relaxed listening
to the story...<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57531.ja:
<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「サダクさんの言った通り　安らぎの香のおかげで
　皆さん　途中までは　リラックスして
　お話を聞いていてくれたのですが……。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57531.ko:
<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 사다크 씨의 말씀대로 평안의 향 덕분에
　중간까지는 모두 편안하게
　이야기를 들어 주셨지만…….<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57531.zh-Hans:
<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>萨达克说的没错，多亏了安宁香料，
大家到中途为止都非常放松地
认真听萨达克讲话……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57531.zh-Hant:
<voice 04221_00057531><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>如薩達克所說，多虧了安寧之香，
大家到中途都非常放鬆地
聽我們說話……<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57532.en:
<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>I hope this won't deter you from joining us again. Please
take this as thanks.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57532.ja:
<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「これにこりず　また
　次の集会に　ご参加ください。
　これは　今回のお礼です。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57532.ko:
<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: 실망하지 마시고
　다음 집회에 또 참석해 주십시오.
　이건 이번 의뢰에 대한 보상입니다.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57532.zh-Hans:
<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>请忘记我女儿今天无礼的举动，
下次的集会也请前来参加。
这是这次的谢礼。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57532.zh-Hant:
<voice 04296_00057532><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>剛才的事還請別放在心上，
下次集會也請前來參加。
這是給你的謝禮。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

57533.en: <voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>...Now then, if you'll excuse me.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57533.ja: <voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>「……それでは　失礼。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57533.ko: <voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>: ……그럼 이만 실례.<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57533.zh-Hans: <voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……那么我先告辞了。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57533.zh-Hant: <voice 04386_00057533><start_lip_sync n02168 _normal m00001>……那我先失陪了。<stop_lip_animation n02168 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000069.en: <voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>I'm worried about Lucolia. She doesn't lie like that!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000069.ja:
<voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>「ルコリアさんが　心配なの。
　ウソなんて　言ってないのに！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000069.ko:
<voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>: 루코리아 씨가 걱정돼.
　루코리아 씨는 거짓말한 적 없는데!<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000069.zh-Hans:
<voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>我很担心露珂莉娅小姐，
她明明说的是真的啊！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>
29000069.zh-Hant:
<voice 04337_29000069><start_lip_sync n00212 _normal m00001>我很擔心露可莉亞小姐，
她明明說的是真的啊！<stop_lip_animation n00212 CLOSE_MOUTH>

29000070.en:
<voice 04338_29000070><start_lip_sync n00330 _normal m00001>You're right, huh. We gotta tell her—even if it's just
